author: @NousResearch
summary: Open-source persistent agent with CLI + messaging continuity, memory hierarchy, subagents, terminal/filesystem/browser control, and explicit linkage to an agentic RL data-generation pipeline.

author: @willccbb
summary: Claims a general cross-domain continual-learning evaluation formalism with promising early experiments.

author: @cwolferesearch
summary: Historical + practical framing: direct assessment rewards and prompt-specific rubrics for granular control over alignment criteria; continuity with Constitutional AI / RLAIF style methods.

author: @saen_dev
summary: Verifiable outcomes reduce preference-label failure modes, but verifying open-ended reasoning remains a central bottleneck.

author: @sachpatro97
summary: Market differentiation remains unclear: high-quality tasks/rubrics/verifiers alone vs full harness and tooling stack.

author: @dair_ai
summary: Clear summary of trajectory-splitting SFT + progressive RL + Research-Factory distillation; highlights the long-horizon agent training bottleneck and reported 106B vs 1T efficiency gap.

author: @guifav
summary: Training recipe quality can dominate raw parameter count for long-horizon agent performance.
